column2: ENGLISH
By Any Other Name
Time to Go
My [Root.GetLordLady]! [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] approaches me with excitement in [courtier.GetHerHis] eyes. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
My [Root.GetLordLady]! [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] approaches me with an armful of scrolls. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"

My [Root.GetLordLady]! [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] approaches me with clothes stained with dirt and fire in [courtier.GetHerHis] eyes. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"

My [Root.GetLordLady]! [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] emerges from a gathering of courtiers and makes [courtier.GetHerHis] way over to me. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"

My [Root.GetLordLady]! [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] approaches me with a large ledger clutched in [courtier.GetHerHis] ink-stained hands. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
My [Root.GetLordLady]! [courtier.GetTitledFirstName] steps out of the shadows beside me with a sharp smile. "Would you do me the honor of bestowing a nickname upon me, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
A group of courtiers approach me, most of whom I barely even recognize.\n\n"We are taking our leave, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Do we go with your blessing?"

After a long council meeting, my head is filled with the latest expense reports. I let out a sigh, a small feeling of defeat building in me, but [upbeat_courtier.GetFirstName] interrupts my thoughts: "I don't know if it matters to you, my [Root.GetLordLady], but many are grateful for the way you are handling the surplus of men and women here in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]."

At the end of supper, [upbeat_courtier.GetTitledFirstName] calls me over to [upbeat_courtier.GetHerHis] table, pointing at a tall glass of [Root.GetAlcohol]. "There are many of us who want to personally thank you for your hospitality, my [Root.GetLordLady]. I know space is hard to come by inside the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]." The [upbeat_courtier.GetManWoman] presses my hand and smiles in gratitude.

During supper, my [upbeat_courtier.GetRootRelation] [upbeat_courtier.GetTitledFirstName] stands up and clears [upbeat_courtier.GetHerHis] throat. "My [Root.GetLordLady], there are many of us who want to thank you for your hospitality, in these trying times. It is not all who would find lodgings for as many as you have managed to, [Root.GetMasterMistress]."
You deserve a good name!
Yes. May you find luck elsewhere!
Aaw, but I actually like sleeping out in the stables sometimes!
Hm, what about...
No, I have changed my mind.
Aaah, but there is strength in numbers, my [upbeat_courtier.GetRootRelation].
Oh, you'll get a nickname alright!
I simply enjoy everyone's company, dear [upbeat_courtier.GetFirstName]!
More people means more resources for... Anything we might require.
I have more important things to do.
A toast to you, my good [upbeat_courtier.GetManWoman]! You are all important to me.
Oh, [upbeat_courtier.GetRootRelation]. You are all important to me, is all.
